project_Description: A real-time collaborative coding platform that allows developers to write, run, and share code together while communicating through integrated chat and video features.
project_Key_Features: Live code editor with syntax highlighting and auto-completion features
Real-time collaboration and version control integration system
Integrated chat and video call functionality for team communication
GitHub project sync and automated deploy preview capabilities
Contributor leaderboard and reward system with gamification
project_Ideal_Member_looking_For: Full Stack Developers with React and Node.js experience
UI/UX Designers interested in building AI-driven developer tools
Backend developers with MongoDB and Express expertise
